 Shivah::
 
Shivah peared behind Drillbit and Kitkat and said "I dealing with a bad situation... that Silverscout has a virus inside but I hope that it doesn't a true trouble, two spies are captured inside BlackFortres if Acyd doesn'�t kill them I personally will execute them and an Idiot-maximal-allie are outside claming for Silverscout and  he said that he has the antivirus, if he doesn't give us that I'll execute Silverscout too."
  RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote: ::KitKat2/StarScream/DrillBit::

KitKat and StarScream walk up to where DrillBit and Killfest are.
"Hey, whats going on?" Asks KitKat.

"We were getting some equipment to help gather information for
extracting DarkFate. But Shivia left, that SilverScout is lose. Speaking
of that..." DrillBit opened a comm to Shivia.
"This is DrillBit, whats the situation?"
